```{r}
#| label: likert-labels
#| tbl-cap: Likert labels
#| message: false
#| code-fold: true
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)

labels <- read_csv("./labels.csv")

labels |>
  select(-id, -symmetrical) |>
  mutate(options = as.character(options), option = as.character(option)) |>
  datatable(
    rownames = FALSE,
    filter = "top",
    options = list(
      pageLength = 10, dom = "tip",
      columnDefs = list(
        list(width = "20px", targets = c(1, 2))
      )
    )
  )
```
